infos.value: *Pant* *pant* *pant*
I must reach Skahal before Zazan does...
The scent of blood... He's close!
...Skahal!
Loreila...
Lady Loreila!
Hahaha! You won't last long with Lady Loreila by our side!
Say your prayers!
W-wait...
L-let him go...
Lady Loreila...?
What did you just say?
Please. Leave this to me and return to the village.
We cannot do that.
This is Skahal, the chief of Saiga. We cannot just look the other way...
I...became the chief to stop all of this fighting.
To do that, we must join hands with Saiga. Which is why...
So it is as Lady Mariale said.
What...?
Someone in Gouga really was communing with the enemy.
But for it to be Lady... No. How dare you, Loreila!
Loreila... You must get out of here.
I will ask you one last timeâ€”leave here at once.
To stop the fighting? How ridiculous!
Do you know what will happen to us without war?
Please, listen to me! Nothing good will come of a battle between Gouga and Saiga!
You know, I have an even better idea.
What...?
You still don't understand, do you?
The chief of Saiga and the traitor of Gouga... If we bring back your heads, we'll be rewarded handsomely!
You cannot mean that...
Saiga will fall and the mercenary business will be ours for the taking!
No...! You're wrong!
You're the one who's wrong, Loreila.
This is the true way of Gouga.
Run, Loreila! They have no interest in your reason!
Loreila!
A village that thrives only at the expense of others...need not exist.
Loreila...
Skahal... I will protect you!
